reviewText: Love this film based on a true story I believe and was delighted to find it on Amazon. Quality is great with subtitles in several languages. Not cheap but I really wanted it and I'm not disappointed. Make sure you are buying the correct format. I'm In Asia so .
I first watched it on a flight from Tokyo.  Very enjoyable so I ordered it so my wife could watch it too.
It was okay.  I would have loved to have seen more cooking ideas but overall, the story was okay.
